key_title: Key to the species of Colobanthus

source.author: West, J.G.; Cowley, K.J.
source.title: Colobanthus
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: Modified from: West, J.G.; Cowley, K.J. (1996). Colobanthus. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Sepals shorter than capsule valves, obtuse or sometimes with short apiculum; fruit extending beyond leaves, on long peduncles; leaves with keeled midrib prominently raised on underside, the apical apiculum less than 0.5 mm long; seed c. 1–1.2 mm long; alpine

Sepals as long as or longer than capsule valves; fruit usually within leaves, on short peduncles; leaves with flattened or rounded, sometimes obscure midrib, the slender apical apiculum 0.5–2 mm long; seed c. 0.5–0.7 mm long; mostly coastal, rarely alpine
Sepals equal to or slightly exceeding capsule valves; leaf apex flat or rounded, the apiculum not less than 1.5 mm long; coastal plants
Sepals exceeding capsule valves; leaf apex rounded, the apiculum up to 2 mm long; alpine plants
